text: Han Seung-soo (born 28 December 1936) is a South Korean politician. He was Prime Minister of South Korea from 29 February 2008 to 28 September 2009, and was the President of the 56th session of the General Assembly of the United Nations, in 2001 and 2002. In 2004, he was honored as an honorary Knight Commander of the Order of the British Empire (KBE) by Queen Elizabeth II. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of South Korea Category:Presidents of the United Nations General Assembly Category:Deputy Prime Ministers of South Korea
title: Han Seung-soo
